title: En Kanmani Unna Pakkama Album Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
en kanmani unna parkaama
unna parthathum uyir seraama
ada naanumthaan inga vazhaama
kedanthen

unna parthathum vizhi 
fuse poga.
ada naanumthaan inga
loose aaga.
ada neeyumthaan 
vittu pogaatha.
penne

palanaalu kanvil naanum
oru maathiri unna paarthen
kanmoodi thirakkum podhu
neeyum engo poniyede

en nilavu engae 
adhi veezhnthathe
en iravu engo adhu 
ponathe.

en imaigal adhu
engo theduthe
en imaigal athai 
ingu theduthe.
adhu vidiyum varai
engo ponathe

oru naal unnai paarthenadi
en kadhal unnai serthu vaika
...

source: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hh362h2xrWI
